1080060.name: Axan Ships - Low Poly
1080060.description:
About low poly version

Ships - Low Poly is a fully functional, low poly version of Axan Ships game
  • Campaign
  • Free galaxy mode with spaceships
  • Free top-down mode

Galaxy mode: Combat System

  • Shield points. Shields get dented on impact
  • No health points but statuses of a ship
  • Two types of rockets
  • Two types of lasers
  • Permadeath

Galaxy Mode: Module System

  • New modules are procedurally developed
  • Modules get broken during battles
  • Modules get old and less reliable

Top-Down Mode

  • scripted top-down missions
